com.samysadi.acs.virtualization.job.operation

Interface OperationSynchronizer

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    OperationSynchronizerDefault

    public interface OperationSynchronizer
    This interface defines an operation synchronizer, which can be used to synchronize multiple SynchronizableOperations.

    After calling addOperation(SynchronizableOperation) on all operations you want to synchronize, the implementation will ensure that the operations will finish at the same time.

    Additionally, if any of the operations completes, fails or is canceled then the other operations will also complete, fail or be canceled.
    All the operations will always have the same RunnableEntity.RunnableState.

    Since:
    1.2

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addOperation(SynchronizableOperation<?> operation)
      Adds the given operation to the list of operations that are synchronized.
      List<SynchronizableOperation<?>> getOperations()
      Returns an unmodifiable list containing all synchronized operations.
      long getSynchronizationDelay()
      Returns the synchronization delay that is used for synchronizing all operations.
      boolean isSynchronizeDelayBeforeCompletion()
      Returns a boolean indicating if the synchronized operations should be delayed before completion.
      void removeAllOperations()
      Removes all operations, and stop their synchronization.
      void removeOperation(SynchronizableOperation<?> operation)
      Removes the given operation from the list of operations that are synchronized.

    • Method Detail

      • addOperation

        void addOperation(SynchronizableOperation<?> operation)
        Adds the given operation to the list of operations that are synchronized.

        If the operation was already added, then nothing is done.

        Parameters:
        operation -
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the given operation is already synchronized using another OperationSynchronizer

      • removeOperation

        void removeOperation(SynchronizableOperation<?> operation)
        Removes the given operation from the list of operations that are synchronized.
        Parameters:
        operation -
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the given operation is not synchronized using this OperationSynchronizer.

      • removeAllOperations

        void removeAllOperations()
        Removes all operations, and stop their synchronization.

      • getOperations

        List<SynchronizableOperation<?>> getOperations()
        Returns an unmodifiable list containing all synchronized operations.
        Returns:
        an unmodifiable list containing all synchronized operations.

      • getSynchronizationDelay

        long getSynchronizationDelay()
        Returns the synchronization delay that is used for synchronizing all operations.

        A negative delay indicates that the operations are delayed.

        Returns:
        the synchronization delay that is used for synchronizing all operations.

      • isSynchronizeDelayBeforeCompletion

        boolean isSynchronizeDelayBeforeCompletion()
        Returns a boolean indicating if the synchronized operations should be delayed before completion.
        Returns:
        a boolean indicating if the synchronized operations should be delayed before completion.
